# Installation

Install the _MyPackage_ package with

```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager", repos = "https://cran.r-project.org")
BiocManager::install("MyPackage")
```

Once installed, load the package with

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(MyPackage)
```

# Support, bug reports, and source code availability

Please ask for help about using this package on the [support
site][]. Remember to tag your question with 'MyPackage', so that
the maintainer is notified.

Retrieve the source code for this package from it's cannonical location

```
git clone https://git.bioconductor.org/packages/MyPackage
```

Use the [bug report url][] to report bugs in _MyPackage_; remember
to reduce your bug report to a simple reproducible example.

[support site]: https://support.bioconductor.org
[bug report url]: https://support.bioconductor.org
